snippet: Djordje Djokovic, 18, is the youngest of Novak’s two tennis playing siblings, and has long been marked as a special talent. But he has only two wins in his first full season on the professional circuit.
abstract: Djordje Djokovic, 18, is the youngest of Novak’s two tennis playing siblings, and has long been marked as a special talent. But he has only two wins in his first full season on the professional circuit.

headline.main: Youngest Djokovic Is Adjusting to Life as a Pro
